admission_text:
#### Choose your membership plan

Basic 

$ 25  Per year

  * __

[ Join Today ](http://web.archive.org/web/20241112082122/https://shop.missionhouses.org/products/basic-membership)

All ages – includes seniors and students. Benefits include a Free Historic House tour, Maile Wreath newsletter by email, and invitations to events. 

Individual 

$ 50  Per year

  * __

[ Join Today ](http://web.archive.org/web/20241112082122/https://shop.missionhouses.org/products/individual-membership)

All ages – includes seniors and students. Basic benefits plus Maile Wreath newsletter by email or U.S. mail and 10% discount on regular merchandise in the Gift Shop. 

Friends & Family 

$ 100  Per year

  * __

[ Join Today ](http://web.archive.org/web/20241112082122/https://shop.missionhouses.org/products/friends-and-family-membership)

Benefits include a Free Historic House tour for up to four people, Maile Wreath newsletter by email or U.S. mail, admission to North American Reciprocal Museums, 10% discount on regular merchandise in the Gift Shop, and 10% discount on programs and tickets. Two membership cards will be issued for O' ahu addresses. 

Contributor 

$ 250  Per year

  * __

[ Join Today ](http://web.archive.org/web/20241112082122/https://shop.missionhouses.org/products/contributor-membership)

Friends and Family benefits and two Free Historic House tour passes for guests. 

Advocate 

$ 500  Per year

  * __

[ Join Today ](http://web.archive.org/web/20241112082122/https://shop.mi...

##  General Public Tours 

View our historic grounds in the heart on Honolulu. 

[ BUY TICKETS ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115075710/https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/missionhouses/items/137401/?full-items=yes)

##  Exclusive Online Merchandise 

Support HMH and view our available print-on-demand products. 

[ Click Here ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115075710/https://shop.missionhouses.org/collections/online-exclusives)

##  School Groups and Special Tours 

View our Education Resource Center for more info. 

[ More Info ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115075710/https://sites.google.com/missionhouses.org/hmheducationresourcecenter/book-a-school-tour)
